## vision\_v1p1beta1.Schema$CropHint interface

Single crop hint that is used to generate a new crop when serving an image.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Schema$CropHint 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [boundingPoly](./vision.vision_v1p1beta1.schema_crophint.boundingpoly.md) | [Schema$BoundingPoly](./vision.vision_v1p1beta1.schema_boundingpoly.md) | The bounding polygon for the crop region. The coordinates of the bounding box are in the original image's scale. |
|  [confidence](./vision.vision_v1p1beta1.schema_crophint.confidence.md) | number \| null | Confidence of this being a salient region. Range \[0, 1\]. |
|  [importanceFraction](./vision.vision_v1p1beta1.schema_crophint.importancefraction.md) | number \| null | Fraction of importance of this salient region with respect to the original image. |
